description.value:
Requirements You're unarmored or wearing light armor.

You have mastered the art of stalking your prey and striking when they are most vulnerable. You Stride and then Strike. If you began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], you remain hidden until after the Strike. You can use Pounce Mimicry while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

value.value:
you have seen a creature 
use an ability that lets them Stride and Strike as a single 
action (such as Pounce) or have identified a creature with 
such an ability in combat
